dataSource.sql: select t.pkid,t.dm,t.mc,t.jc,t.pxh,t.bq,t.zt,t1.dmbz,t1.dmmc from yj_dmk_cl t left join yj_dmk_fl t1 on t1.dmbz=t.dmbz

select t.id as spid,t.spbm,t.spmc,t.spms,t.splxdm,t.sppp,t.mdid,t1.id as spxqid,t1.gg,t1.dj,t1.dwdm,t2.id as spjgid,t2.bzjg,t3.mc as dw,t4.mc as splx from erp_commodity t left join erp_commodity_detail t1 on t1.spid=t.id left join erp_commodity_price t2 on t2.spxqid=t1.id left join yj_dmk_cl t3 on t3.dmbz='DW' and t3.dm=t1.dwdm left join yj_dmk_cl t4 on t4.dmbz='SPLX' and t4.dm=t.splxdm where t.del_flag=0

SELECT t.id,t.title,t.url,t.icon,t.parentId,t.isDirectory,t.sort,t.del_flag,t.createTime,t.path ,t1.title as parent_title FROM erp_menu t left join erp_menu t1 on t.parentId=t1.id where ifnull(t.del_flag,0)!=-1

SELECT t.id,t.menuId,t.permission,t.parentId,date_format(t.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime,t.createUser,t.description ,t.sort,t.path,t1.title as menuTitle,t2.permission as parentPermission,t3.name as createName FROM erp_permission t left join erp_menu t1 on t1.id=t.menuId left join erp_permission t2 on t2.id=t.parentId left join erp_user_detail t3 on t3.userId=t.createUser

SELECT t.id,t.client,t.deptName,t.parentId,t.isSystem,date_format(t.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime,t.createUser ,t1.deptName AS parentDeptName,IFNULL(t.`status`,0) as `status`,t.path,t3.name as createName FROM erp_dept t left join erp_dept t1 on t1.id=t.parentId left join erp_user_detail t3 on t3.userId=t.createUser where IFNULL(t.`status`,0)=0

SELECT t.id,t.roleName,t.description,t3.name as createName,date_format(t.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime ,group_concat(t2.description separator ',' ) as permission FROM erp_role t left join erp_role_permission t1 on t1.roleId=t.id and t1.client=t.client left join erp_permission t2 on t2.id=t1.permissionId left join erp_user_detail t3 on t3.userId=t2.createUser where t.client=1000 or t.client=#{client} group by t.id,t.roleName,t.description,t3.name,t.createTime

select t.userName,t1.id,t1.client,t1.deptId,t1.`type`,t1.name,t1.sex,t1.birthday,t1.certificate,t1.interest,t1.phone,t1.userId,t1.email,t2.deptName,t3.mc as typeMc ,group_concat(t5.description separator ',' ) as roleName from erp_user t left join erp_user_detail t1 on t1.userId=t.id left join erp_dept t2 on t2.id=t1.deptId left join yj_dmk_cl t3 on t3.dm=t1.`type` left join erp_user_role t4 on t4.userId=t.id and t4.client=t1.client left join erp_role t5 on t5.id=t4.roleId and t5.client=t4.client group by t.userName,t1.id,t1.client,t1.deptId,t1.`type`,t1.name,t1.sex,t1.birthday,t1.certificate,t1.interest,t1.phone,t1.userId,t1.email,t2.deptName,t3.mc

SELECT t.id,t.client,t1.name as lifnr_name,t.`type`,t.ydlx,t2.mc as jhfs_mc,t3.mc as ysfs_mc,t4.mc as jsfs_mc,t5.mc as zffs_mc,t.lifnrOrder,t.remark,t.kbetr,t.`status` ,date_format(t.qdrq,'%Y-%m-%d') as qdrq,t6.name as createName,date_format(t.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime FROM erp_purchase t left join erp_lfa1 t1 on t1.id=t.lifnr left join yj_dmk_cl t2 on t2.dm=t.jhfs left join yj_dmk_cl t3 on t3.dm=t.ysfs left join yj_dmk_cl t4 on t4.dm=t.jsfs left join yj_dmk_cl t5 on t5.dm=t.zffs left join erp_user_detail t6 on t6.userId=t.createUser

SELECT t.id,t.client,t.yddh,t.ydlx,date_format(t.dsrq,'%Y-%m-%d') as dsrq,date_format(t.dhrq,'%Y-%m-%d') as dhrq,t.qsr,t.shdz,t.`status`,t.remark,date_format(t.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime, t2.name as createName,t3.lifnr,t3.lifnrOrder FROM erp_take t left join erp_user_detail t2 on t2.userId=t.createUser left join erp_purchase t3 on t3.id=t.yddh

SELECT t.id,t.client,t.name,t.`type`,t.city,t.jlfw,t.product,t.address,t.zcbh,t.gsxz,t.jgdm,t.dlfr,t.yyzz,t.remark,t.createUser,t.flag ,date_format(t.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime,t1.name as createName,t2.jc as ssq,t3.mc as typeName FROM erp_lfa1 t left join erp_user_detail t1 on t1.userId=t.createUser left join yj_dmk_cl t2 on t2.dmbz='COUNTY' and t2.dm=t.city left join yj_dmk_cl t3 on t3.dmbz='GYSLX' and t2.dm=t.`type`
